Phrase: A Steel Seeker suddenly appeared as we were about to head into the interior of the Giant Tree. From Mary's reaction, it seems to be of a slightly different nature to the ones we have faced before.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I can't feel Ricardo's pain and suffering. Don't tell me this is another illusion of the Giant Tree...?

Name: Mary
Phrase: No, it's not.

Name: Mary
Phrase: This is Ricardo's will. She sent a messenger because she had something to tell us.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Isn't that right? Ricardo?

Name: Steel Seeker
Phrase: Mary. Are you here?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: It spoke!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Wasn't that the voice that spoke to us the other day inside the Terminal?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Yes! That's the voice that said 'Poison is Steel'!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: So the one who's talking to Mary now is Ricardo Trevithick... Conductor's mother.

Name: Steel Seeker
Phrase: Mary. Thank you for bringing my son here. The day has finally come for our Mist Train to pass through these gates.

Name: Mary
Phrase: The train I built will run on the Giant Tree Railroad. I have dreamed of this day for so long.

Name: Mary
Phrase: The truth is you and I were supposed to be on this Train. Even without the cooperation of the Knights, even without the understanding of the Alliance. Just the people who were on Ricardo's side. We could have had the Train running.

Name: Mary
Phrase: But in the end that didn't happen. We noticed something strange happening to Iris Cloud before we could get the Mist Train going.

Name: Mary
Phrase: And the train's furnace stopped responding to Ricardo's magic...

Name: Steel Seeker
Phrase: The Mist we are trying to clear was meant to protect us from the Poison that is trying to destroy the world. We should have interrupted our Mist-clearing journey.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Don't worry. I've explained that to everyone. Conductor came here on the Mist Train to see the truth with his own eyes. To find out what it is that needs to be cleared up.

Name: Mary
Phrase: He is trying to face the Giant Tree with the eyes of truth, without being bound by tradition, convention, nationality, status or rank. That's your son, Ricardo. Just like you when you were young.

Name: Mary
Phrase: We haven't seen each other in ages. Why don't you talk to your son for a bit? You haven't seen him for a while now.

Name: Steel Seeker
Phrase: Mary, the St. Iris Giant Tree will die soon. Kill me before it does.

Name: Steel Seeker
Phrase: I can no longer regain humanity. Prepare to kill me before he sets foot in the Keeper's Chamber. Tell my son that.

Name: Steel Seeker
Phrase: I have discovered the flow of the Poison that is polluting the Giant Tree will be kept in my body and soul in the Guardian's Chamber. In the meantime, kill me and take me out of the Giant Tree.

Name: Steel Seeker
Phrase: Make sure you bring my son. Without his strength, I cannot be stopped. Protect him at all costs.

Name: Steel Seeker
Phrase: I'm counting on you. Mary. Do your knightly duty.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: It disappeared. Not even a word to Conductor...

Name: Putra
Phrase: Why? It was so difficult for them two to be together!

Name: Mary
Phrase: I understand now, it was an illusion magic Ricardo put up at the Gate. She can't see us and he can't hear us. She knew that one day I would come here through the Giant Tree Railroad. That recording was prepared a long time ago.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Illusions that are triggered by sensing specific magical powers, this is a bit similar to Nishikese sorcery. It looks simple but it is actually a very difficult sorcery that requires a high level of skill.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Ricardo loved Conductor. There is no way she could have come face to face with her son and not said something.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Perhaps Ricardo doesn't even have the luxury of making any other illusions anymore. We can assume it's a very urgent situation...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: This situation requires shasho, Mary can't do anything about it.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Isn't that right? Assuming what Ricardo says is true

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: There's no point in Mary becoming a human pillar, but there is a way to save the Giant Tree instead.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Kill Ricardo. That's what it said.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Hold on just a minute. Lady Ricardo is Conductor's mother, remember!?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: ... You're not still going to tell me there's another way? You kept looking for a way that wouldn't make Mary sacrifice herself. We've all come this far with the same feelings.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: I would save them all if I could. But we can't, and so many people sacrificed their lives for this moment. How many people do you think have lost their lives fighting the Phantom Mist in this world?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It's all about saving the Iris Cloud. That's why we do what we can.
I want to say that Yakutsk is right, but there is no need to be so definitive at this stage.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Conductor...
How do we know if we don't try? How do we know if we don't go? That's how we have been searching for new paths. So we won't know the truth until we get inside the Giant Tree and meet Ricardo,
If what Ricardo said earlier is true, I will end her life as she wished. Although it comes with the sad consequence of sacrificing a Divine Child, I think it's the best way to go at the moment.

The one who's trapped in the Giant Tree isn't an ordinary civilian, but a Divine Child who plunged into the Mist to save this world. Just like knights and soldiers, there are reasons for a Divine Child to be a Divine Child.

All in order to save this world. To protect it. Ricardo Trevithick must have long prepared to face the consequences of death. If it is for the good of this world, even ruin together is a good outcome.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: If what Ricardo said earlier was true, Ricardo's efforts must not be in vain.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ricardo has been fighting all her life, right? She went through many battles like Yoshino and the others, and she finally reached the Giant Tree.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: And doing that without the Mist Train too.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Many of our allies were sacrificed, some of them lost their lives to protect Ricardo.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Even after that battle was over, Ricardo was alone in the Giant Tree the whole time, wasn't she?

Name: Mary
Phrase: ...Yes.

Name: Mary
Phrase: For the sake of everyone that lives here in Iris Cloud, she continues to endure intense pain and that makes both her mind and body scream.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Steel Seekers were born out of Ricardo's pain and suffering. By making them breathe out Poison, and by suffocating them, Ricardo's burden could be eased.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: So that's why Mary was calling in a lot of Steel Seekers previously.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: You could always count on Mary to be around Steel Seekers. Mary was always there.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: If that logic holds, then what Ricardo said sounds right...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: What is that light?

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Soon the door to the Giant Tree will open. Those who proceed along the steel railway must pass through the door. The Guardian of the Giant Tree will wait for you in the Guardian's Chamber.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Paddington's acting strange again.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Paddington's strange because Islington said it might be because of the Giant Tree.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: The Guardian of the Giant Tree has opened up the Station of Peace and Iridescent Clouds. But it won't last long because of the otherworldly Poison. Welcome to the Guardian's Chamber. Unleash the Guardian of the Giant Tree.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Whoa! Paddington's flying!?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: She got straight onto the Train. Should we really leave her alone?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Mary, is she controlled by Lady Ricardo too?

Name: Mary
Phrase: No, it's not Ricardo's work.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Then what's going on? Lady Paddington was like this in Flamarine, too. She was in that state of mind...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: She wasn't levitating though at the time.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: The magic train will now depart from the Giant Tree Railroad. To enter the Giant Tree of St. Iris.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Ascending energy fill rate to the Guardian's Chamber at 85%. Gate release rate at 90%. Confirming steel railway acceleration mode shift. Signal yellow. Green shortly.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: The Mist Train and rails are glowing...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It looks like its going to start running any minute now. Shasho didn't inject any magic into it.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: You don't mean to tell me that Paddington's injecting magic into the Phantom Mist core?
No, that's impossible. Certainly the Mist Train's furnace is showing a reaction, but I sense a different kind of power than the magical power that is activated when the train is in operation.

That is not the magic power emitted by the Train itself. The big gate leading to the Giant Tree and the rail have been glowing red since a few minutes ago and is suppling a tremendous amount of magical power to the Train...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Gate 100%. Signal green. The magic train has been balanced by the power output and acceleration boost of the steel rail. All passengers must board immediately. Repeat. All passengers must board immediately.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Hey, this could be a problem if we don't get on board.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Right. At this rate, Paddington's going to go off on her own.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: We're already inside the Giant Tree. If we don't all go together, there's no point in coming this far. Let's follow Conductor's instructions and get on the train as soon as possible.

The train knights are hurriedly boarding the Mist Train, which is about to start moving after receiving a mysterious supply of magical power. The energy transmitted by the glowing red rails to the train's wheels is so tremendous, that it feels like the train is likely to fly forward as soon as it departs.
All hands, prepare for a rapid start and high speed travel. Once we pass through the Gate, we are already inside the Giant Tree. Maintain battle formation to anticipate sudden attacks.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Boarding complete. Everyone is in position. We are finally entering the Giant Tree. Let's be careful.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: We'll keep an eye on Paddington as well. Vivienne, Putra. Keep an eye on her so she doesn't fly off on her own.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Aye aye sir!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Should it ever comes to it, we'll just tie her up with a rope and twirl her around!

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Passengers all aboard confirmed. The magic train will now pass through the gates of Giant Tree of St. Iris.
The Special Steel Squad had travelled from country to country to clear the world of Mist.
--The Mist and steel have a close relationship.
--The way to save Iris Cloud lies inside the Giant Tree.
The Mist Train follows the steel railway route covered by the Sea of Fog, and finally came to the inside of the Giant Tree.
This is where Ricardo Trevithick is. She is the greatest Divine Child in the history of St. Iris, and the first woman in the history of humanity who designed the first vehicle to run on a railway.
Her sacrifices and responsibilities to keeps the world in harmony, is waiting for us somewhere inside this Giant Tree...
